API for Placer¶

GridBasedPlacer()

This is the placer class. You will need to instantiate an instance of this class to run a placement job.

void GridBasedPlacer::test_hplacer_flow()¶

This is the main function that runs placement.

Getters¶

double GridBasedPlacer::get_total_cost()¶

Gets the total weighted cost (badness) of the current solution.

double GridBasedPlacer::get_wirelength_cost()¶

Gets the total weighted cost of the wire length.

double GridBasedPlacer::get_overlap_cost()¶

Gets the total weighted cost of overlap.

double GridBasedPlacer::get_temperature()¶

Gets the current temperature.

Setters¶

void GridBasedPlacer::set_base_lam(double _lam)¶
void GridBasedPlacer::set_bb_ec(bool _bb)¶
void GridBasedPlacer::set_wirelength_weight(double _cst)¶
void GridBasedPlacer::set_lambda_schedule(double _lsched)¶
void GridBasedPlacer::set_two_sided(bool _2sided)¶
void GridBasedPlacer::set_initial_move_radius(double _eps)¶

Sets the starting move radius. The move radius decreases automatically during placement.

void GridBasedPlacer::set_rtree(bool _rt)¶

Sets the usage of rtree data structure for detecting overlap. This can provide faster performance on large designs.

void GridBasedPlacer::set_lam(bool _lam)¶
void GridBasedPlacer::set_lamtemp_update(double _coef)¶
void GridBasedPlacer::set_num_iterations(int iter)¶

Sets the number of annealing iterations (temperature updates).

void GridBasedPlacer::set_iterations_moves(int iter)¶

Sets the number of moves per component during annealing. The total moves per temperature update will be this number times the number of components.

void GridBasedPlacer::set_initial_temperature(double tmp)¶

PCB-Layout-Framework
